summary: Added validation in Todo.from_dict to reject id < 1, ensuring consistency with next_id() behavior which returns minimum value of 1

changes.description: Added id >= 1 validation in from_dict method
Added regression tests for id=0 and negative id validation
Fixed pre-existing bug in test that used id=0 (invalid per system invariant)

risks: None - this is a validation fix that enforces an existing system invariant
